product_name: Pearl Izumi EM Road N 0 Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The lightest, least padded road-running shoes from Pearl Izumi, the EM Road N 0 Shoes are built for runners seeking the sweet spot between a comfortable cushion and a minimalist road feel. Barely-there seamless mesh uppers with synthetic overlays create a socklike fit that conforms to your foot. Lightweight E:MOTION EVA midsoles deliver a smooth, responsive rebound with an ideal balance of ground feel and cushioning. Dynamic Offset delivers a smooth sensation with an ever-changing heel to ball-of-the-foot offset during the stride; offset is 1mm at contact and changes to 4.5mm at mid-stance. Pearl Izumi EM Road N 0 Road-Running Shoes have outsoles that combine EVA with blown rubber in the forefoot for traction, durability and a lively feel.
short_description: The lightest, least padded road-running shoes from Pearl Izumi, the EM Road N 0 Shoes are built for runners seeking the sweet spot between a comfortable cushion and a minimalist road feel.
